original_text: Gideon said to them, ‘What you did in the fight was more important than what I was able to do. My family started the battle, but your tribe finished the job!
korean_text: 기드온이 그들에게 이르되 내가 이제 행한 일이 너희가 한 것에 비교되겠느냐 에브라임의 끝물 포도가 아비에셀의 맏물 포도보다 낫지 아니하냐

sentences.original_text: What you did in the fight
was more important than what I was able to do
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 할 수 있었던 일보다 더 중요했습니다

sentences.original_text: but your tribe finished the job
